title: Apaga Apaga Apaga (Ao Vivo)
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Eu acho que cê tem que mandar aquela mensagem
lines.translation: I think you have to send that message.
lines.grammar: acho (1sg present), mandar; watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'I think you have to send that message.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Mas manda o que tá no seu coração
lines.translation: But send what's in your heart.
lines.grammar: coração (1sg present); watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'But send what's in your heart.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Porque se fosse eu
lines.translation: Because if it were me
lines.grammar: watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'Because if it were me'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Eu falaria mais ou menos assim
lines.translation: I would say something like this
lines.grammar: mais; watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'I would say something like this'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Ei, boa noite, antes de te bloquear
lines.translation: Hey, good evening, before I block you.
lines.grammar: antes (2sg present), bloquear; de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das); Meaning: 'Hey, good evening, before I block you.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Eu só vim te dizer que a partir de hoje
lines.translation: I just came to tell you that starting today
lines.grammar: dizer, partir; a + article contracts (ao/à); de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das); Meaning: 'I just came to tell you that starting today'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Pode tocar o terror, fazer o que quiser fazer
lines.translation: You can cause chaos, do whatever you want to do.
lines.grammar: tocar, fazer, quiser; watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'You can cause chaos, do whatever you want to do.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: A boca é sua, curte suas farra, sinto mais nada
lines.translation: It's your mouth, enjoy your parties, I don't feel anything anymore.
lines.grammar: suas (2sg present), sinto (1sg present), mais; a + article contracts (ao/à); Meaning: 'It's your mouth, enjoy your parties, I don't feel anything anymore.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Não! Apaga, apaga, apaga
lines.translation: No! Delete it, delete it, delete it.
lines.grammar: watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'No! Delete it, delete it, delete it.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Oi, boa noite!
lines.translation: Hey goodnight!
lines.grammar: watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'Hey goodnight!'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Só vim pedir um tempo
lines.translation: I just came to ask for some time.
lines.grammar: pedir, tempo (1sg present); watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'I just came to ask for some time.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Pra dar tempo de esquecer
lines.translation: To give time to forget.
lines.grammar: dar, tempo (1sg present), esquecer; de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das); Meaning: 'To give time to forget.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Especialmente hoje
lines.translation: Especially today
lines.grammar: watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'Especially today'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Coração acordou me pressionando pra te ver
lines.translation: My heart woke up urging me to see you.
lines.grammar: coração (1sg present), acordou (common past ending), pressionando (1sg present); watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'My heart woke up urging me to see you.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Saiu de casa, não posta nada, esconde as farra
lines.translation: She left home, didn't post anything, and hid her partying.
lines.grammar: de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das); Meaning: 'She left home, didn't post anything, and hid her partying.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Apaga, apaga, apaga
lines.translation: Delete, delete, delete
lines.grammar: watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'Delete, delete, delete'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Meu amor, por favor
lines.translation: My love, please
lines.grammar: por (cause/path); Meaning: 'My love, please'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Fala que você também não me esqueceu
lines.translation: Tell me you haven't forgotten me either.
lines.grammar: watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'Tell me you haven't forgotten me either.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Que eu tô digitando tudo que o coração escreveu

lines.translation: If longing also brings tears to your eyes
